text: I don't have many either. lol I like wifi with some games. Like Minecraft. It's good to play that with your friends online. But I also like going over to friends' houses and playing old school games with them in person. And bleh, COD is horrible. Every game is practically the same concept. I don't see how that franchise ever made it.

text: oh, i liked wifi. if your a saddo like me with no mates the you can have a blast with it. (i do have mates, but not many of them are mario kart fans. most of them like call of duty)
author: Dead Loser

text: Wifi really isn't all that important imo, and the bikes weren't really great. I mean it is called Mario KART for a reason. It's go-kart racing, not bike racing. Plus the wheel would get annoying cause i'd only turn it a little bit and it'd make me do a u-turn. I don't mean to be coming off as an asshole by the way, this is a good debate. Actually kind of fun debating video games. haha

text: bikes, tricks, new characters, DECENT wifi, multiple ways to play. all in mkwii...

text: How could you like MK Wii better than the first two? It was just a continuation of the same old thing. Double Dash at least offered the partner system and MK 7 offered more customization. But MK Wii wasn't really special at all. I mean I know it's your opinion and all, but just saying.
